text:
@richardhorton1 This is shocking.

@MattHancock and @NHSEngland  would you care to explain why you are sending boxes of 4 yr out of date surgical masks with fake best before dates to GP practices as PPE to "protect" us from #coronavirus ? I guess we really are expendable https://t.co/TrvBoA1rWU
